languages.text: "Подтверждаю. Число сторонников догмата Прерывания Цикла не соответствует ранее сделанным прогнозам. Открытость заявления о своей приверженности к учению благословенного Амарната — аномальна. Единица заинтригована".

"Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."
languages.original_text: "Подтверждаю. Число сторонников догмата Прерывания Цикла не соответствует ранее сделанным прогнозам. Открытость заявления о своей приверженности к учению благословенного Амарната — аномальна. Единица заинтригована".

traits.locale_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “确实如此。愿意终止循环的追随者数量，与早期估算结果并不一致。许多成员公开宣称自己相信蒙福者阿玛纳特的教义，这样的结果相当反常。本单位对此很感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。愿意终止循环的追随者数量，与早期估算结果并不一致。许多成员公开宣称自己相信蒙福者阿玛纳特的教义，这样的结果相当反常。本单位对此很感兴趣。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Affirmatif. Le nombre d'adeptes de l'Interruption du Cycle ne correspond pas aux prévisions précédentes. La volonté de déclarer son engagement à l'égard des préceptes du bienheureux Amarnat est anormale. Cette unité est perplexe. »
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. Le nombre d'adeptes de l'Interruption du Cycle ne correspond pas aux prévisions précédentes. La volonté de déclarer son engagement à l'égard des préceptes du bienheureux Amarnat est anormale. Cette unité est perplexe. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Confirmado. La cantidad de partidarios que abogan por la interrupción del Ciclo no se corresponde con el pronóstico anterior. La predisposición para declarar su compromiso con los preceptos del bendito Amarnat es inusual. Esta unidad está intrigada».
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."

traits.locale_text: «Confirmado. La cantidad de partidarios que abogan por la interrupción del Ciclo no se corresponde con el pronóstico anterior. La predisposición para declarar su compromiso con los preceptos del bendito Amarnat es inusual. Esta unidad está intrigada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「確認した。サイクル中断を指示する信奉者の数は、先の予言とは一致していない。祝福されたアマルナトの教えへの献身を宣言する意欲が異常だ。この隊は興味をそそられる」
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."

traits.locale_text: 「確認した。サイクル中断を指示する信奉者の数は、先の予言とは一致していない。祝福されたアマルナトの教えへの献身を宣言する意欲が異常だ。この隊は興味をそそられる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bestätigt. Die Zahl der Anhänger, die den Kreislauf durchbrechen wollen, stimmt nicht mit der früheren Prognose überein. Die Bereitschaft, sich den Lehren des gesegneten Amarnat zu verschreiben, ist abnormal groß. Diese Einheit ist fasziniert."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."

traits.locale_text: "Bestätigt. Die Zahl der Anhänger, die den Kreislauf durchbrechen wollen, stimmt nicht mit der früheren Prognose überein. Die Bereitschaft, sich den Lehren des gesegneten Amarnat zu verschreiben, ist abnormal groß. Diese Einheit ist fasziniert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Onaylandı. Döngü süreğinin bozulumu taraftarlarının sayısı, önceki ölçümlerle uyuşmuyor. Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın öğretilerine bağlılık duyduğunu belirtmek bir anomalidir. Durum, bu birime tuhaf gelmekte."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The number of adherents of Discontinuing the Cycle does not correspond with the earlier prognosis. The willingness to declare one's commitment to the teachings of blessed Amarnat is anomalous. This unit is intrigued."
